summary: Young British boys and girls travel to an isolated cabin after being promised a night of heavy partying. Instead of the fun they hoped for, they meet a killer out to reap vengeance on them for the death of his brother.
cast: Tom Kane|Liam Boyle|Jack Gordon|Florence Hall|Jennie Jacques|Alexander Vlahos|Jason Maza|Mark Underwood|David Sterne|David Oakes|Elana Di Troya|Nicky Henson
keywords: lesbian kiss|homophobia|truth or dare|drinking acid|cheating on boyfriend
title: Truth or Dare
